content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install the "arcgis" module using "pip install -U arcgis" and added the correct path to the system path using "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages". However, I encountered a ModuleNotFoundError. I then tried "pip show arcgis" and "pip install arcgis", but both returned warnings that the package was not found. I attempted to install "arcgis" using "conda install -c esri arcgis", but received an error that "conda" was not found. I then downloaded and installed Miniconda using "wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p $HOME/miniconda && rm Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && source $HOME/miniconda/bin/activate && conda install -c esri arcgis", which successfully installed "arcgis".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "source $HOME/miniconda/bin/activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response')]
"""
